#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int arr[10][15],diff[10];
	long long int t,x,y,min,mini;
	cin>>t;
	long long int i,j;
	while(t--){
		for(i=0;i<10;i++){
			for(j=0;j<15;j++){
				cin>>arr[i][j];
				if(j==0){
					x=arr[i][0];
					y=arr[i][0];
				}
				if(arr[i][j]>x)
					x=arr[i][j];
				if(arr[i][j]<y)
					y=arr[i][j];		
			}
			diff[i]=x-y;
			if(i==0){
				min=diff[i];
				mini=i;
			}
			if(diff[i]<=min){
				mini=i;
				min=diff[i];
			}
		}
		cout<<(mini+1)<<" "<<min<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
